    • 方法详细资料

      • findBySeuqnce

        java.util.List<LuckyNumber> findBySeuqnce(long sequenceNum,
                                        java.lang.String gameInstanceId,
                                        int countOfNumbers)
        Lookup a set of sequential numbers. If lucky number reach the end of a cycle, it should restart from beginning then.
        参数:
        sequenceNum - The sequence No. of begin lucky number.
        gameInstanceId - The game instance.
        countOfNumbers - How many numbers will be sold?
        返回:
        a set of sequential lucky numbers.

      • findBySeuqnces

        java.util.List<LuckyNumber> findBySeuqnces(java.lang.String gameInstanceId,
                                         java.lang.Long... sequenceNum)

      • findByGameInstanceId

      • getMaxNumberSeq

        int getMaxNumberSeq(java.lang.String gameInstanceId)
